HIGH.chrome.tabs.query: Return all info about specific tabs.
HIGH.chrome.cookies.getAll: Can retrieve all cookies, including all details about them.
HIGH.chrome.cookies.get: Can retrieve all details about a specific cookie.
HIGH.chrome.cookies.getPartitionKey: Gets the partition key which can be used to track user.
HIGH.chrome.cookies.set: Can set cookies which could track users.
HIGH.chrome.scripting.executeScript: Injects a script into target content and runs the script.
HIGH.chrome.downloads.setUiOptions: Can hide downloads UI, making downloads invisible to user

MEDIUM.chrome.tabs.remove: Can close one or more tabs without user knowing.
MEDIUM.chrome.downloads.download: Can download arbitrary files onto user's machine
MEDIUM.chrome.identity.getAuthToken: Returns the OAuth2 token for a user.
MEDIUM.chrome.tabs.captureVisibleTab: Screenshots the visible area of the current tab. Can capture sensitive data.
MEDIUM.chrome.management.getAll: Can read all installed extensions and apps.
MEDIUM.chrome.alarms.create: Creates an alarm near the time specified.
MEDIUM.chrome.runtime.sendMessage: Sends messahes to event listeners in the extension.

LOW.chrome.contextMenus.create: Creates a new context menu item.
LOW.chrome.i18n.getMessage: Retrieves localized messages from the browser and displays it as a string.
LOW.chrome.action.setBadgeText: Sets badge text for action above the icon.
LOW.chrome.history.search: Searches the history for the last visit time of each page matching the query.
